name: Lyresong
title: Lyresong
desc: "The traditions of song and poetry, flowing onward in clear, moving melodies."

skills.desc: Return an Artifact card equipped by your character to your Hand. During this Round, the next time you play an Artifact card from your hand: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. If you have not played any other Action Cards before playing this card, spend 2 less Elemental Dice.
